# The Bitcoin DeFi Bible
> Your complete guide to Bitcoin DeFi, SlowFi, and OP_NET technology.
> The cypherpunk's handbook to the next evolution of decentralized finance.

## About This Site
The Bitcoin DeFi Bible (defibible.org) is a comprehensive guide to native Bitcoin DeFi powered by OP_NET — smart contracts on Bitcoin Layer 1 without bridges, wrapped tokens, or L2s. It covers DeFi mechanics (AMMs, yield farming, staking), Bitcoin-native trading via NativeSwap, and how to deploy tokens and yield farms on Bitcoin.

## Full Content
For the complete text content of every page on this site, fetch:
- https://defibible.org/llms-full.txt

## Pages

### Home
- URL: https://defibible.org/
- Description: Landing page with overview of Bitcoin DeFi Bible, quick navigation to all topics

### TLDR
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/tldr
- Description: 5-minute overview of Bitcoin DeFi — the big idea, the stack, and what you can do

### Introduction
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/introduction
- Description: Welcome guide explaining DeFi Summer history and what you'll learn

### The SlowFi Thesis
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/what-is-slowfi
- Description: Why exit friction makes DeFi games sustainable and why Bitcoin is the optimal environment

### Why Bitcoin?
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/why-bitcoin-defi
- Description: Bitcoin's structural advantages for DeFi — hard block space limit, fee wall, no wrapped tokens

### OP_NET Overview
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/opnet-overview
- Description: How OP_NET enables smart contracts on Bitcoin L1 — architecture, token standards, epoch system

### Bitcoin Token Wars
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/bitcoin-token-wars
- Description: Why BRC-20 and Runes failed and how OP-20 tokens fix the liquidity problem

### Motoswap Exchange
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/motoswap
- Description: The first fully decentralized exchange on Bitcoin L1 — pools, fees, LP provision, swapping

### NativeSwap (BTC Trading)
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/nativeswap
- Description: Bitcoin-native AMM with P2P settlement — constant product formula, seller queue, two-phase commit

### OP-20S Stablecoins
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/op20s-stablecoins
- Description: Real USD-pegged stablecoins on Bitcoin L1 with peg-aware AMM pricing

### MotoChef (Yield Farming)
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/motochef
- Description: MasterChef-style yield farming on Bitcoin — history of DeFi Summer and how it's replayed on Bitcoin

### Proof of HODL
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/proof-of-hodl
- Description: Earn yield on BTC without locking it — UTXO-based staking with no custody, no delegation, no slashing

### The $MOTO Token
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/moto-token
- Description: Revenue-sharing token — stake MOTO to earn a cut of every swap on Motoswap

### Yield Farming
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/yield-farming
- Description: How yield farming works mechanically — reward math, pool types, bonus periods, staking/harvesting

### Farming Strategies
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/farming-strategies
- Description: Advanced strategies — timing entry, LP vs single-sided, compounding, exit signals

### Deploying Tokens
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/deploying-tokens
- Description: How to deploy OP-20 tokens on Bitcoin L1 — yield-bearing vs simple tokens, supply planning

### Deploying Yield Farms
- URL: https://defibible.org/docs/deploying-farms
- Description: How to deploy MotoChef yield farms — pool configuration, weights, bonus periods, step-by-step guide

### Quiz
- URL: https://defibible.org/quiz
- Description: Interactive quiz with 50+ questions covering SlowFi, OP_NET, Motoswap, NativeSwap, and more

## Key Concepts
- **SlowFi**: DeFi mechanism where structural exit friction (slow blocks, high fees) keeps capital in protocols longer
- **OP_NET**: Consensus protocol enabling smart contracts on Bitcoin Layer 1
- **NativeSwap**: Bitcoin-native AMM with P2P BTC settlement and two-phase commit
- **Motoswap**: First DEX on Bitcoin L1 — AMM pools, yield farming, token launches
- **MotoChef**: MasterChef-style yield farming engine on Bitcoin
- **Proof of HODL**: Non-custodial BTC staking using UTXO tracking
- **OP-20**: Fungible token standard on Bitcoin (like ERC-20)
- **OP-20S**: Stablecoin extension for OP-20 with peg-aware AMM pricing
- **$MOTO**: Revenue-sharing token — stakers earn fees from all Motoswap swaps

## Ecosystem Links
- Motoswap DEX: https://motoswap.org
- OP_NET Docs: https://docs.opnet.org
- OPScan Explorer: https://opscan.org
- OPTools: https://optools.org
- OP_WALLET: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/opwallet/pmbjpcmaaladnfpacpmhmnfmpklgbdjb
